actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to include modifications to chlor-alkali electrolytic cells in credit for investment in certain energy property.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an investment tax credit for modifications to chlor-alkali electrolytic cells.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to include modifications to chlor-alkali electrolytic cells in credit for investment in certain energy property.
